296977.「はじめまして！ ここでは１０周年を記念して\n 様々な特殊効果を かけているよ:
Goo-d to meet you! We're celebrating the 10th Anniversary with a goo-riety of neat effects! Here's some examples...
Monsters will drop Commemorative Lotto Pieces, and it'll be easier to encounter Metal-type Slimes and rarefied monsters!
When you use the Commemorative Magic, monsters will sometimes drop those Commemorative Lotto Pieces! How goo-reat!
The magic is divided per continent, and the chance of a monster dropping one differs depending on the location.
There are certain locations where the magic has no effect. Please check the official site for details.
Commemorative Magic is special, and can be applied at the same time as other perfumes and charms. Try using them together!
If you bring me enough pieces, you can exchange them for 10th Anniversary Lotto Tickets.
Please note that the effect to encounter Metal Slimes easier is a special perfume, and you can't use another perfume at the same time.
Also note that the effect to see rarefied monsters easier is a special charm, and you can't use another charm at the same time.
The rarefied monsters you'll encounter easier will differ depending on the time. I'll let you know which when I apply the charm.
Now, let's get started!

296978.「ようこそ！ １０周年を記念して\n 様々な特殊効果を かけているよ！\n 何が:
Goo-d to see you! To celebrate the 10th
Anniversary, there's all kinds of special
effects! Which would you like?
<break>

296979.「ほかに 何か用はあるかなー！\n<break>:
What else can I goo for you?
<break>

296980.「記念ふくびきマジックだね！\n なんと ８時間 効果があるんだ！\n<br_b:
Commemorative Magic? The effect lasts for
8 hours!
<br_break>

296981.「<%sM_WORLD> だね！\n この大陸のマジックを かけてもいいかな？\:
<%sM_WORLD>, hm?
You'd like me to use this magic on you?
<yesno><break>

296982.「<%sM_WORLD> での\n マジックをかけたよー！\n 違う大陸にしたい:
I just gave you the magic for
<%sM_WORLD>!
Speak to me again if you want to change it!
<end>

296983.「メタルフィーバーの香水だね！\n なんと ８時間 効果があるんだ！\n 香水を:
You want the Metal Fever Perfume? The effect
lasts for 8 hours!
<yesno><break>

296984.「メタルフィーバーの香水をかけたよー！\n 期間中であれば 何度でもかけられるか:
I just sprayed some Metal Fever Perfume
on you! If you need more, please speak to
me again!
<end>

296985.「ごめんね。現在は開催していないのー。\n<end>:
Sorry. That event isn't being held now.
<end>

296986.「転生フィーバーのおまじないだね！\n おまじないは ３０分しか効果がないんだ。:
Reincarnation Fever Charm? You can get this charm effect once per day, and it lasts 30 minutes.
This is the monster that you'll encounter more easily! Do you want the charm?

296987.「転生モンスターフィーバーの\n おまじないを かけたよ！\n 今日の分は おし:
I just used the Reincarnation Fever Charm on
you! That's all for today!
<end>

296988.「ごめんね。現在は開催していないのー。\n<end>:
Sorry. That event isn't being held now.
<end>

296989.「どの説明を聞く？\n<select_se_off>\n記念ふくびきマジック\n:
Which can I explain?
<select_se_off>
Commemorative Magic
Remove Magic
Metal Fever
Rarefied Fever
View Exchange
Event Period
<select_end><break>

296990.「交換期間は\n 『2023年3月31日 23：59』までだから\n 気を付けて:
You have until 3/31/2023 at 23:59 JST to
exchange for items.
<end>

296994.「<%sM_WORLD> だね！\n 現在 すでにマジックが かかっているけど\:
<%sM_WORLD>, huh?
You already have magic cast on you, is it
okay to overwrite it?
<yesno 2><break>

296995.「今かかっている 記念ふくびきマジックを\n 消してしまってもいいかな？\n<y:
Do you want me to remove the Commemorative
Magic currently cast on you?
<yesno 2><break>

297631.「<%sM_WORLD> だね！\n この大陸のマジックを かけてもいいかな？\:
<%sM_WORLD>, huh?
You'd like me to use this magic on you?
Just remember we're still preparing.
<yesno><break>

297878.「あれ？ すでに 香水をつけているみたいだけど\n 上書きしてもいいかな？\n<:
Hm? Looks like you're already wearing perfume.
Is it okay if I overwrite it?
<yesno 2><break>

298136.「記念ふくびきマジックを 消しました！\n また 遊びにきてね～！\n<end>:
I removed your Commemorative Magic!
Come back anytime!
<end>

298248.「あれ？ すでに おまじないが\n かかっているみたいだけど\n 上書きしてもい:
Hm? Looks like you already have a charm cast
on you. Is it okay if I overwrite it?
<yesno 2><break>

298249.「ごめんね。現在は開催していないのー。\n 次回の開催は \n <%dM_cal:
Sorry, this event isn't being held now. The
next period is on <%02dM_cal_MM>/<%02dM_cal_DD>/<%dM_cal_YYYY> at <%02dM_hh>:<%02dM_mm> JST.
<end>

298250.「ごめんね。現在は開催していないのー。\n 次回の開催は \n <%dM_cal:
Sorry, this event isn't being held now. The
next period is on <%02dM_cal_MM>/<%02dM_cal_DD>/<%dM_cal_YYYY> at <%02dM_hh>:<%02dM_mm> JST.
<end>

298252.「記念ふくびきマジックは 効果をかけると\n たまにモンスターが 記念ふくびきの:
When you use the Commemorative Magic, monsters will sometimes drop those Commemorative Lotto Pieces! How goo-reat!
The magic is divided per continent, and the chance of a monster dropping one differs depending on the location.
There are certain locations where the magic has no effect. Please check the official site for details.
Commemorative Magic is special, and can be applied at the same time as other perfumes and charms. Try using them together!

298253.「もし 記念ふくびきマジックが\n いらなくなった場合は\n ボクが 消してあげ:
If you don't want the Commemorative Magic anymore, I can make it disappear!
Don't worry about removing it. I can always cast it again anytime!

298254.「メタルフィーバーは メタル系のスライムに\n ものすごく 会いやすくなるものだ:
Metal Fever is a special effect that makes encountering Metal-type enemies much easier! It's only available for 10 days.
You can't use this effect and that of another perfume at the the same time, so be careful.
You can use this effect as many times as you like during the event!

298255.「転生フィーバーは 転生モンスターに\n ものすごく 会いやすくなるものだよ！\:
Rarefied Fever is a special effect that makes encountering rarefied enemies much easier! It's only available for 10 days.
You can't use this effect and that of another charm at the the same time, so be careful.
Unlike the other effects, this one can only be cast once per day, and lasts 30 minutes.

298256.「集めた 記念ふくびきの切れはしを\n 持ってきてくれたら\n １０周年記念ふく:
If you bring me enough pieces, you can exchange them for 10th Anniversary Lotto Tickets.
Also, if you collect Souvenir Shards from Sarybeth's lottery draw, you can exchange those for actual souvenirs!

298257.「ボクたち アニバスとサリベスは\n ２０２３年３月３１日まで ここにいるよ！\:
Me and Annivers will be here until 3/31/2023!
Please check the official site for more
details!

298356.「あれ？ 今日はすでに おまじないを \n かけているみたいだよ。\n １日１回:
Hm? I already cast a charm on you today. I
can only do it once per day. Sorry about
that.
<end>

299754.「どの大陸で モンスターが\n 記念ふくびきの切れはしを 落とすようにする？\n:
Which continent would you like monsters to
drop Commemorative Lotto Pieces? Remember,
each continent has a different drop chance!
<break>

299755.「ごめんねー。\n 今は準備中だから もう少し待ってほしいな！\n<end>:
Sorry! I'm still getting ready. Please wait
a little longer!

299783.「あれ？ 記念ふくびきマジックは\n かかっていないみたいだよ？\n また 必要:
Huh? You don't have any Commemorative Magic
cast on you right now. Let me know if you
need it again.
<end>

307486.「ごめんね！ １０周年のお祭りは おしまい。\n 『2023年3月31日 23：:
Sorry, but the 10th Anniversary festivities
are over! You have until 3/31/2023
at 23:59 JST to exchange, so make sure you do!
<br_break>

307565.「ごめんねー。\n ボクたち もう帰らなきゃ。\n またどこかで 会えたらうれし:
Sorry... we're closing up shop here to goo
back home. I hope we can see each other
some slime!
<end>
